about_the_game:
Original Soundtrack of 'Chasing Light'. Total 45 tracks.
Part 1 is in 320kbps MP3's format, Part 2 is in 160kbps MP3's format.
Never listen to it until you have finished Chasing Light.

Composed by Park Na Hyun, Bae Sang Hyun
Produced by Bae Sang Hyun

Part 1 - Total 21 tracks.

01. Ouija Board (1:39)
02. Seoul, South Korea (0:58)
03. Model! (0:43)
04. Let's Pick One (1:15)
05. Then We Can Reduce Carbon Dioxide in This Place (3:08)
06. Cavalry's Here! (1:17)
07. Get Some Water (0:45)
08. Ah, Boom! (3:34)
09. Party People (1:38)
10. They Wiped Out Money with GOTY! (2:55)
11. Of Course in a Good Sense (1:05)
12. A! B! C! E! A! B! C! E! (2:53)
13. But That Shitty Seniors Still Remain (3:25)
14. It's Very Dangerous to Say It's a Work. It Makes You Forget that This Is a Product. (0:41)
15. Get Your Shit Together! (0:53)
16. Hall of the Light (1:34)
17. Naked and Blind (1:31)
18. ' ' (1:51) Composed and performanced by Bae Sang Hyun
19. The Light Shines Black (4:44)
20. Chasing Light (2:35)
21. Bae Sang Hyun, Park Na Hyun, Hwang Juno, and the Declaration of Ten's Art (3:21)

Part 2 - Total 24 tracks.

01. Eccentrip in Seoul (20:01)
02. Fatality (0:40)
03. Hail to the Crow (1:12)
04. Lonely Zero (0:26)
05. Man Behind the Veil (2:56)
06. My Dear Son (0:49)
07. Over the Boundary (1:07)
08. Ridiculous Mirror Ball (0:16)
09. Score Is Here (0:37)
10. Symphony for Quadruple T (0:32)
11. Tea Time with Fairy (0:24)
12. The Brown Mass Met in the Forest (0:42)
13. The Sincere Heart of a Six-Year-Old Girl (0:30)
14. Abandoned Teddy Bear (0:35)
15. Honey I Will Swallow You (1:19)
16. I Came up from the Blood Pit (1:38)
17. Snake's Tongue and Fangs (1:09)
18. Flow, Time! (2:41)
19. Get the Hell Out of Here (0:22)
20. Rebels (1:01)
21. What Are You Hiding? (1:40)
22. You Are Fixed (1:13)
23. You Shall Not Pass (2:30)
24. Let's Take a Break (Bonus Track) (1:14) Singer-songwriter Bae Sang Hyun
